title: Shockwave Games Universal Patcher R1
description:
About:

Shockwave.Games.Patcher.R1-RES-patch * . * 11.27.2008

First release of this patch combo for games from shockwave and nick games.

Currently only Win XP has been tested with these patches so if you are planning to use on Vista & given the history of generic inlining on arma games be prepared for a crash.

I will be adding support for Vista once I get the patch procedures cleaned up and some testing on XP has been done. If you want to help test on vista ( Have Ollydbg installed on vista and some knowledge of Olly is a plus ) and know how to get a hold of me go ahead and drop me a line.



Patch Configuration:

Game Patch = shockwave.games.project.r1.exe

DRM Patch = shockwave.games.project.(drm-patch).r1.exe

*Refer to info.txt for instructions on how to use *



Game Sites Supported:

Shockwave - shockwave.com/download.jsp

Nick Arcade (Nickelodeon) - arcade.nick.com/nick/home.jsp
